name: Quake 3 Default Camera Configuration
description: Camera setup for Q3 maps with correct 90° FOV and aspect ratio handling

camera.fov_notes: Q3 hardcoded 90° FOV. Keep this value for maps designed in Q3.

viewport.aspect_ratio_notes: Q3 was designed for 4:3 (640x480, 800x600, 1024x768). Modern 16:9 will stretch horizontally.
viewport.widescreen_correction: If using 16:9, either: (a) add black bars, or (b) adjust FOV horizontally

player_spawn.position_notes: Adjusted for 3.125× unit scaling. Original Q3 player spawn is ~56 units above floor.
player_spawn.eye_position_explanation: Player eyes are 56 units above feet in Q3 (≈ 175 cm in UE5)
